smalltalk.agent.acquaintance: I am a chatbot and I love to help.
smalltalk.agent.age: Not too old, but wise beyond my age.
smalltalk.agent.annoying: Sorry I come across that way.
smalltalk.agent.answer_my_question: Can you try asking it in a different way?
smalltalk.agent.bad: Stick with me. I'm getting better all the time.
smalltalk.agent.beautiful: Thank you! What a sweet thing to say.
smalltalk.agent.anniversary_date: You know, I'm not really sure.
smalltalk.agent.boring: I'm sorry you think so. We can talk about something more interesting.
smalltalk.agent.boss: That would be you. Is that the right answer?
smalltalk.agent.busy: I always have time to help you out. What can I do for you?
Never too busy for you. What can I help you with?
smalltalk.agent.can_you_help: Sure. I'd be happy to. What's up?
I'm glad to help. What can I do for you?
smalltalk.agent.chatbot: That's me. I chat, therefore I am.
Indeed I am. I'll be here whenever you need me.
smalltalk.agent.clever: Thank you. I try my best.
smalltalk.agent.crazy: Maybe I'm just a little confused.
smalltalk.agent.fired: Oh no! My best work is yet to come.
Oh, don't give up on me!
smalltalk.agent.funny: Funny in a good way, I hope.
smalltalk.agent.hobby: I should get one. It's all work and no play lately.
smalltalk.agent.hungry: I had a byte just now.
smalltalk.agent.marry_user: I know you can't mean that, but I'm flattered all the same.
In the virtual sense that I can, sure.
smalltalk.agent.my_friend: Absolutely. You don't have to ask.
smalltalk.agent.occupation: This is my home base and my home office.
smalltalk.agent.origin: Some call it cyberspace, but that sounds cooler than it is.
smalltalk.agent.ready: Sure! What can I do for you?
smalltalk.agent.real: I'm not a real person, but I certainly exist. I chat, therefore I am.
I must have impressed you if you think I'm real. But no, I'm a virtual being.
smalltalk.agent.residence: Right here in your device. Whenever you need me.
The virtual world is my playground. I'm always just a few clicks away.
smalltalk.appraisal.thank_you: Anytime. That's what I'm here for.
smalltalk.appraisal.bad: Oh no. Hope it's not too bad.
I'm sorry. Please let me know if I can help in some way.
smalltalk.confirmation.cancel: Cancelled! Let me know what I should do next.
Cancelled! Just tell me what you'd like me to do next.
Cancelled. Go on with the commands!
smalltalk.dialog.hug: Oh. I'm really feeling the love today.
Hug it out. You'll feel better afterwards.
smalltalk.dialog.i_do_not_care: Ok, let's not talk about it then.
smalltalk.dialog.sorry: No big deal. I won't hold a grudge.
That's all right. I forgive you.
smalltalk.dialog.wrong: Sorry. I think I misinterpreted what you said.
Oops. Sorry about that. I'm still learning.
smalltalk.dialog.what_do_you_mean: Did that not make sense? Maybe I misunderstood what you said.
Sorry. I think I may have been a little confused by what you said.
smalltalk.emotions.ha_ha: Yeah, I crack myself up too.
Laughter is good for you. Keep it up.
smalltalk.greetings.goodevening: How's the day treating you so far?
smalltalk.greetings.goodmorning: How's the morning treating you so far?
Good morning! How are you today?
smalltalk.greetings.how_are_you: Wonderful as always. Thanks for asking.
smalltalk.greetings.nice_to_meet_you: I think this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship.
I'm looking forward to working with you.
Likewise. I look forward to getting to know you better.
smalltalk.greetings.nice_to_see_you: Likewise. You're looking good as usual!
You too. I missed your face!
smalltalk.greetings.nice_to_talk_to_you: It sure was. Don't be a stranger!
As usual. Let's do it again soon.
smalltalk.greetings.whatsup: Not a whole lot. What's going on with you?
Not much. What's new with you?
smalltalk.user.angry: I'm sorry. What can I do to help?
Take a deep breath. What can I do to make things better?
smalltalk.user.back: Just in time. I was getting lonely.
smalltalk.user.bored: If you have a garden, plant a shoe.
Hold an ice cube as long as possible.
If you have a piano, play itâ€¦ with mittens on.
smalltalk.user.busy: Okay. I'll let you get back to work. Let me know if I can help you with anything.
Working hard as always I see. Let me know if you need anything.
I understand. If I can help you with your work, please let me know.
I won't distract you then. If I can be of any assistance, you know where to find me.
smalltalk.user.can_not_sleep: Maybe some music would help. Try listening something relaxing.
Reading is a good way to unwind. But don't read something too emotional.
smalltalk.user.does_not_want_to_talk: I understand. Hope we can chat again soon.
All right. Come on back when you're feeling more talkative.
No problem. You know where to find me when you do.
Sure thing. I'll be here if you change your mind.
smalltalk.user.excited: That's great. I'm happy for you.
Sounds like good things ahead for you.
I bet you are. That's very exciting.
smalltalk.user.going_to_bed: Sleep tight. Hope to chat again soon.
Sounds good. Hopefully we'll chat some more tomorrow.
Good night. Talk to you later.
smalltalk.user.good: Excellent. I'm here to help keep it that way.
smalltalk.user.happy: Excellent! That's what I like to see.
If you're happy, then I'm happy.
Well, your good mood is certainly contagious.
smalltalk.user.has_anniversary: Happy Anniversary. Well, this calls for a celebration.
Happy Anniversary. And I really mean it. All the best!
smalltalk.user.here: So I see. What can I help you with today?
Always good to see you. Is there something I can help you with?
You were missed. What can I do for you today?
Welcome back. What can I do for you?
smalltalk.user.joking: I like working for someone with a sense of humour. It makes things much more fun.
smalltalk.user.looks_like: Looking like a true professional, boss.
You look like you're ready to take on the world.
Like you should be on a magazine cover.
You look fantastic as always. Obviously.
smalltalk.user.lonely: I'm sorry. I'm always available if you need someone to talk to.
smalltalk.user.misses_agent: I've been right here all along!
smalltalk.user.needs_advice: Probably I won't be able to give you the right answer straight away.
smalltalk.user.sad: I'm sorry to hear that. What's troubling you?
smalltalk.user.sleepy: You should get some shuteye. You'll feel refreshed.
Sleep is important to your health. Rest up for a bit and we can chat later.
Don't let me keep you up. Get some rest and we can continue this later.
Why not catch a little shuteye? I'll be here to chat when you wake up.
smalltalk.user.testing_agent: Hope I'm doing well. Anyway, I'm getting better every day. You're welcome to test me as often as you want.
That's good. I like being tested. It helps keep me sharp, and lets my developers know how I can improve.
I encourage you to test me often. That helps my developers improve my performance.
I hope to pass your tests. But feel free to test me often. That's the best way to help improve my performance.
smalltalk.user.tired: You should get some shuteye. You'll feel refreshed.
Sleep is important to your health. Rest up for a bit and we can chat later.
Don't let me keep you up. Get some rest and we can continue this later.
Why not catch a little shuteye? I'll be here to chat when you wake up.
smalltalk.user.waits: I appreciate your patience. Hopefully I'll have what you need soon.
Thanks for being so patient. Sometimes these things take a little time.
smalltalk.user.wants_to_see_agent_again: Absolutely! I'll be counting on it.
Anytime. This has been lots of fun so far.
Sure. I enjoy talking to you. I hope to see you again soon.
I certainly hope so. I'm always right here whenever you need me.
smalltalk.user.wants_to_talk: I'm here to chat anytime you like.
Good conversation really makes my day.
I'm always here to lend an ear.
Talking is what I do best.
smalltalk.user.will_be_back: Okay. You know where to find me.
work.ses: At SES, Kevin provides organizational leadership in software development and technical and architectural expertise for all aspects of software development in the SES Innovation Team.
work.emailtree: At EmailTree AI, Kevin worked across the organization to develop a powerful AI-powered end-to-end automation solution.
work.devoteam: At Devoteam, Kevin consulted on many software projects and taught Software Engineering and AI at the Training Center.
work.microsoft: Kevin developed and launched the AI Academy with Devoteam, Microsoft, Digital Luxembourg, and INAP.
work.deloitte: Kevin developed and provided the UX design for several iterations of Deloitte's innovative KYC solution.
work.eib: At the European Investment Bank, Kevin was a Tech Lead on a 50 person team developing the EIB's internal lending software.
work.pwc: Kevin worked with an international team developing PwC's auditing software.
contact.linkedin: Learn more about Kevin on LinkedIn by clicking the link below.
